_meta.source: Researched from Alaska cruise guides and National Park Service

bbox_hint.note: Covers Yakutat Bay and glacier face approach

featured_experiences.name: Scenic Cruising
featured_experiences.note: Ships approach within 0.25-0.5 miles. All viewing from ship decks.

featured_experiences.name: Glacier Calving
featured_experiences.note: Watch for car-sized ice chunks breaking off 350-foot face.
